exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R a, b : R Heq : a = b Unable to unify "Sup_fct ?M2378 ?M2379 ?M2380 = Sup_fct ?M2378 ?M2380 ?M2379" with "(if Req_EM_T b b then 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\\ Rmin b b < x < Rmax b b)) = 0".

original: unfold Inf_fct. unfold Sup_fct. destruct (Req_EM_T a b) as [Heq | Hneq]. - rewrite Heq. symmetry. apply Sup_fct_bound. - f_equal. apply Glb_Rbar_sup_eq_inf.
